name: Mariana (Jakjoud)
description:
This game was made for the godot wild jam.

The ambiance and sound effects were made with my mouth (as the wild cards asked)

The subtitle contains a pun : Naughtylus in stead of nautilus  (as the other wild cards asked)

Moving the submarine is challenging, you use the arrow keys but only gravity can get you down so you need to time your motion.

To get in and out of the submarine use the "Shift" key and to use the blaster or the torch (if you unlock it) use the spacebar.

I used a mix of assets from https://ansimuz.itch.io/ as well as https://opengameart.org/users/sean-noonan, https://opengameart.org/users/snoopethduckduck and https://foozlecc.itch.io/

I altered sprites and added some shaders and effects but credit goes to these wonderful artists for the graphical assets
